name: Virtual High School Girl
description:
This games shows you all cool school activities and most amazing school adventure. Play this game and find out how cool is to attend the first day of school. Its Hazel first day at school. She is very confuse and nervous at this time. Help her in doing different school activities and make her day cool and fun filled.

Activities like find admin office, girls washroom, science lab to perform some science experiments, locker room and many more activities are waiting for you to perform. Inspiring high school story line with surprising interactive experiences. Different real life engaging activities. Unlock different levels with performing amuse activities and be a popular girl in school.

Be the most classy girl out there in your new high school.

Features of Virtual High School Girl:
• Different amazing activities
• Inspiring high school story line
• High Quality 3D Graphics
• Awesome Sounds
• Smooth and Easy Controls
• addictive game play
• Super cool school environment
